            <entry>cahi1:data_b072b953a8b70aee3d9e73ad3cc4b276b5f918fe</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Cold draught in front of a chimney</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kalter Entwurf vor einem Kamin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ébauche froide devant une cheminée</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esboço frio na frente de uma chaminé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Brutta copia fredda davanti un camino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κρύα έλξη μπροστά από μια καπνοδόχο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Bosquejo frío delante de una chimenea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of four illustrations showing the use of convection currents. This diagram shows why one feels a cold draught in front of a chimney.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heater</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">convection current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot liquid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von vier Abbildungen, die den 
Gebrauch von Konvektionströmen zeigen. Dieses Diagramm zeigt, 
warum man einem kalten Entwurf vor einem Kamin glaubt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de quatre illustrations montrant 
l'utilisation des courants de convection. Ce diagramme montre 
pourquoi on sent une ébauche froide devant une cheminée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de quatro ilustrações que mostram o 
uso de correntes do convection. Este diagrama mostra porque um 
sente um esboço frio na frente de uma chaminé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano l'uso delle correnti di convezione. Questo schema 
mostra perchè uno ritiene una brutta copia fredda davanti un camino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν τη χρήση
των ρευμάτων μεταφοράς. Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει γιατί 
κάποιος αισθάνεται μια κρύα έλξη μπροστά από μια καπνοδόχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran el uso de las corrientes de la convección. Este 
diagrama muestra porqué uno siente un bosquejo frío delante de una 
chimenea.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
